item.description:
Sorry-this meetup is auto generated. Since it's Easter we will meet on Saturday instead.

So you don't get spammed any further-the meetup on this Saturday, March 28th will be at Peter's Park instead of Doggie Day-please take note as it will only change on the meetup site.


Come join for our first Sunday outdoor meetup of the season! Just a reminder that we will have a Sunday meetup on the second weekend of the month, and a Saturday meetup on the fourth weekend of the month. More fun for the dogs! Please be aware that these rarely last 2 hours with the dogs so heated up! If for some unknown reason it's below freezing or raining then we will move to Doggie Day on Tremont Street-I'll update accordingly the day before based on weather predictions.

~Terri & Simon & Louie

Cancellation procedure: Unless there is a snowstorm we are on! I'll email around 8AM if the weather we cancel. Please use your discretion driving in foul weather.

Please note: Meetup.com charges each group a month meetup fee. This is a GROUP fee and if not paid, our Boston French Bulldog meetups, would not exist.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the small fenced in area of the park

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston French Bulldog April Meetup
